name: Runner Race
description:
Just a short normal race,
get to the finish line first and you win, that's all

Use aswd or arrow to move,
and maybe left-click

Made for Beginner (Not enough information) and Quacky game jam (Life Isn't Fair),

Any feedback will be very appreciated
